metadata.synopsis: Tomb 03 in Open Hand Temple Graveyard

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *Brilgor. Fell to a plot of the Absolute - dying without cause. May he find peace with Ilmater.*

1.speaker: Narrator
1.text: *Brilgor. Fell to anger and rage - taking Father Lorgan with him. May Ilmater forgive him.*
